definition: to halt/to stay/to be stationed (of troops, diplomats etc)
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua

sentences.english: The security guard of the apartment did not enter the Visa Office of the South Korean Embassy.
sentences.chinese: 公寓保安人員沒有進入韓國駐華使館領事部。

sentences.english: Jean-Marie Lehn, French ambassador to China and winner of Nobel Prize for Chemistry delivered a speech.
sentences.chinese: 法國駐華大使和諾貝爾化學獎得主廉恩博士發表演講。

sentences.english: Mr. Zhang Shigang is holding the position of UNEP Country Coordinator in China.
sentences.chinese: 張世鋼先生現任聯合國環境規劃署駐華代表。

sentences.english: Two of this season's shows are sponsored by the US Embassy.
sentences.chinese: 該演出季的兩場演出得到了美國駐華使館的贊助。

sentences.english: This American barista didn't give the Ambassador to China an ounce of face.
sentences.chinese: 美國店小二竟不給駐華大使一點面子。

sentences.english: Present at the briefing were over 60 journalists from home and abroad and information officials from foreign embassies in China.
sentences.chinese: 60餘名中外記者和部分駐華使館新聞官出席。

sentences.english: Mr. Ji Jae Ryong, the new DPRK Ambassador to China arrived in Beijing today.
sentences.chinese: 新任朝鮮駐華大使池在龍先生已於今天抵達北京。

sentences.english: Please click here for a map of the Cana'dian Em'bassy area.
sentences.chinese: 加拿大駐華大使館位置圖，請在此點擊。

sentences.english: Be transferred from the Ministry of Commerce Ambassador demoted?
sentences.chinese: 調離商務部駐華大使算是降職？

sentences.english: The foreign office of Jilin Province has already informed relevant embassies in China.
sentences.chinese: 吉林省外辦已將上述情況通報了有關國家駐華使館。

sentences.english: Locke is the first Chinese-American to serve as ambassador to China.
sentences.chinese: 駱家輝是第一位擔任駐華大使的美籍華人。

sentences.english: Fifth, to further carry out the work on the team of wives of African diplomatic envoys to China.
sentences.chinese: 五是進一步開展非洲駐華使節夫人小組工作。

sentences.english: Our FCS China office supports these trade and tourism missions.
sentences.chinese: 美國駐華使領館商務處爲這些訪團提供支持。

sentences.english: Kamyshev Serhii, Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Embassy of Ukraine gave a splendid speech in this forum.
sentences.chinese: 烏克蘭駐華大使閣下在此次論壇上致辭。

sentences.english: He works at the French Legation in China.
sentences.chinese: 他在法國駐華大使館工作。

sentences.english: S Korea appoints new ambassador to China.
